exercise.description: Physical fitness contributes to extending and increasing the quality of life more than any other factor.

meditation.description: Meditation for the mind is what physical exercises are for the body.

fasting.description: Fasting not only allows you to lose weight, but also has a positive effect on our health.

water.info: Water reduces appetite, is necessary for each cell, and also has a very positive effect on the condition of the skin.
